1.12.2.2.1.3:
More Planets 2.1.3 Change Log
+ Added Slab to Block recipes 
+ Added Black Hole/Ion Cannon schematics to Tier 4 Loot 
+ Added Space Portal multi-layer model support 
* Update Latest GC API. Closes #33 
* New Black Hole gravity behavior 
* Renamed "Infected Crystallized Web" to "Infected Crystallized Cobweb" 
* Renamed "Large Infected Crystallized" to "Infected Crystallized Crystal" 
* Shield Generator its "shield" now should rendered properly 
* Only enable Space Portal recipe when enabled survival planet config 
* Space Portal now require to stand on the block 
* Prevent Milk from cure capsule effect 
* Minor performance improved 
* Optimize JEI recipes 
* Improved Black Hole Storage schematic 
* Fixed Grass color in space biomes 
* Fixed Black Hole not spawning falling block 
* Fixed Sealable Waste Rod model 
* Fixed invisible item models (Forge build 2725) 
* Fixed Black Hole Storage schematic valid item slot 
* Fixed Infected Spore Protection potion duration time
1.12.2.2.1.2:
More Planets 2.1.2 Change Log
* Fixed crash when JEI not installed 
* Fixed rare crash with Infected Crystallized potion overlay
1.12.2.2.1.1:
More Planets 2.1.1 Change Log
* Optimized Shield rendering 
* Fixed Server Side crash 
* Fixed required library issue 
* Fixed Dark Energy Generator rotation 
* Fixed Shield Generator Inventory GUI offset 
* Fixed Shield Generator item duplication 
- Remove Space Capsule
1.12.2.2.1.0:
More Planets 2.1.0 Change Log
+ Added Undyed Tinted Glass 
+ Added Crashed Alien Ship structure to Diona 
+ Added Cheese Spore Hut to Chalos 
+ Added Alien Chest 
+ Added Infected Oak/Alien Berry Oak Pressure Plate 
+ Added Infected Spruce Sapling 
+ Added Terrasquid 
+ Added Koentus Moon (WIP) 
+ Added Koentus Meteor 
+ Added Creep Block/Creep Extractor/Creep Vines 
+ Added New Advancement (WIP) 
+ Added Colored Star/Fancy Star configuration 
+ Added Survival Planet Selection (replaced started planet) 
+ Added Space Nether (Survival Planet Selection only) 
+ Added Planet/Moon tier configuration. Implemented #10 
+ Added Advancement for JSON Recipes 
+ Added Upgrade recipes 
+ Added JEI Anvil recipes for tools/armor 
+ Added More biomes to Nibiru 
+ Added New Rarity Color and Restore old GC Item Rarity 
* Flattening all blocks/items name 
* More Ore Dictionary support 
* More CTM support 
* Oil Ore will spawn liquid oil when exploded 
* Can create infinite Purified Water only in Green Vein biomes 
* Entities now can breathe in Green Vein biomes 
* Nuclear Waste Tank now can create Waste Rod by liquid Nuclear Waste 
* Better TESR Rendering 
* Better multiblocks rendering 
* Better planets sky rendering 
* Crystallized Lava/Nuclear Waste bucket can be used as fuel 
* Nibiru creatures now avoid the thunder 
* Rewrite Nibiru Villager 
* Rewrite Nibiru Stronghold 
* Mutalic Crystal Tools/Armor ability changed 
* Adjust sun brightness for Alien Beam spawning 
* Improved Alien Beam rendering 
* Improved block ticking performance 
* Improved Nibiru cloud/weather rendering 
* Improved Vein Floater boss spawning/teleporting 
* More minor issue fixes 
* More biome decorator fixes 
* More entities hitbox fixes 
* Fixed mob spawning on planets 
* Fixed Battery in Inventory issue 
* Fixed Space Warp Pad multiblocks issue 
* Fixed rare startup crash 
* Fixed Diona/Nibiru stuck in dimension load/unload loop. Closes #22 
* Fixed Lava Fluid light level 
* Fixed multiblocks crash at Y 255 
* Fixed structures location in world 
* Fixed Infected Water fluid conflict with Extra Planets mod 
* Fixed snowball not dropped from snow layer 
* Fixed Shield Generator inventory issue 
* Fixed Vein Floater boss fight music 
* Fixed Zergius causes world corruption. Closes #30 
* Fixed Custom Boss Bar not rendered 
- Removed Metadata from blocks/items 
- Removed Tiered Rocket 
- Removed Rocket Crusher
